name: gloss
content:
gloss noun
(APPEARANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ S or U ] a smooth, shiny appearance on the surface of something: a gloss Marble can be polished to a high gloss.gloss finish This varnish provides a long-lasting and hard-wearing gloss finish.
[ U ] paint that produces a smooth, shiny appearance on a surface: gloss (paint) We'll need a litre of gloss (paint) to cover the woodwork. All the shades are available in matt or gloss. Compare
matt
[ U ] a substance used to make your lips, hair, or skin appear shiny: lip gloss Red lip gloss gave her a glamorous look.
